content: i whipped up these cabled fingerless mitts for my mother-in-law using just 2/3 of a skein of koigu they came out so cute it was really *really* hard to gift them away but i did…then promptly went out and bought another skein in the exact same colorway to make a pair for myself as it turns out i wasn t the only one with mitt envy just three days later mil emailed me to say when i wear my fingerless gloves i encounter many envious women everybody wants them including sil who would kill for a pair ah nothing like the threat of felonious activity to make a knitter feel good please click here 1 for errata note the pdf was updated on 10/1/09 with instructions on when to slip the markers for the thumb gusset elveawen 2 has created a spanish translation of the pattern - find it here 3 *** i regretfully cannot provide pattern support at this time thank you for your understanding *** 1 http //knittywhipped blogspot com/2008/01/free-patterns-one-and-all html 2 http //www ravelry com/people/elveawen 3 http //www scribd com/doc/44716101/mitones-envidia-traducidos-por-elveawen
